short_summary: Supply of Environmental Chamber – Humidity Cabinet
description: The Canada Border Services Agency has a requirement for the supply of Environmental Chamber – Humidity Cabinet off of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI. Organization Name: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA), CBSA Procurement Division (CPD), Operations (OPS) Solicitation Date: October 6th, 2022 Closing Date: October 21st, 2022 Anticipated Start Date: TO BE DETERMINED Estimated Delivery Date: TO BE DETERMINED Contract Duration: The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of Contract award with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to one additional one-year period. Solicitation Method: Competitive Applicable Trade Agreements: CFTA Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement Applies: No Number of Contracts: 1
